DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no question that asks whether the patient/participant consented to participating in optional study components.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the patient's consent to participate in optional  various research activities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Possible but not necessary; left to personal choice.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Possible but not necessary; left to personal choice.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient consent to op
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to optional core study components at the time of randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Document Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant consent to the optional blood portion of study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient consented to optional blood sample collection

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to give his/her tissue sample(s) to NCCTG for research testing planned as part of this study

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission for NCCTG to give his/her stored blood samples for use in future research to outside researchers

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient given permission for optional sample banking for future cancer research studies

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to give his/her sample(s) for research testing

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission for Alliance to give his/her stored blood samples for use in future research to outside researchers

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to the extra FES-PET/CT scan prior to hormone therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to take part in the imaging study and will have the extra FLT PET/CT scan prior to chemotherapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to take part in the imaging study and will have the extra FES-PET/CT scan prior to hormone therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: MA39
ReferenceDocuments.description: Most recent REB approved optional bio-banking informed consent has been signed and dated by the patient and "YES" or "NO" has been circled.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that his/her MRI images(s) and related health information may be used in future health research.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to take part in the extra FES-PET/CT scan prior to hormone therapy.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: IF YES: Does the participant agree that the liver biopsy tissue stored at the hospital can be used for this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP-Text-2
ReferenceDocuments.description: IF YES: Does the participant agree to undergo an additional, optional liver biopsy at the Screen 2 Visit?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to optional study to assess renal toxicity of ifosfamide/carboplatin/etoposide using conventional and novel biomarkers of renal toxicity (urine NGAL, cystatin C and Kim1)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to take part in the PRO-CTCAE.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to take part in the health outcomes disparities study

Replaced Protocol Administration Ind-2 2018304v1 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
